entry.title: Solana NFT Marketplace Tensor's Token Debuts to $640 Million in Trading Volume
entry.summary: Tensor's Blur-like rewards model finally pays off as NFT traders unlock their Solana tokens—and one trader got more than $1 million worth.

entry.title: Is BitVM the Holy Grail of Bitcoin? It’s Complicated, Developers Say
entry.summary: Trust-minimized Bitcoin bridges using BitVM can work, but it may take a while for users to get their funds out.

entry.title: The Bored Ape Restaurant in LA Closed—But That's Not the Whole Story
entry.summary: After two years in business, the NFT-themed restaurant shuts down, turning toward Asia and the Middle East.

entry.title: First Eyeballs, Now Palms: TON Offers $5 Million for Latest ‘Proof of Personhood’ Push
entry.summary: Biometrics developer HumanCode joins The Open Network to offer $5 million in Toncoin for enrolling in an AI-powered palm-scanning program.

entry.title: Former Crypto Titans Return From the Dead
entry.summary: History has a habit of repeating itself. As Bitcoin surges again, OGs of the crypto space are resurfacing. Can they hold onto the spotlight?

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF Hype May be ‘Moderating’ as Year-to-Date Growth Nears $14 Billion
entry.summary: Cash is still flooding into Bitcoin-based investment products as investors remain hungry for exposure to digital assets.

entry.title: Bitcoin Spike Ahead of Halving Boosts Coinbase, MicroStrategy Stock Prices
entry.summary: As Bitcoin rises, so too do shares of public companies giving exposure to the asset: Coinbase and MicroStrategy are among today's big gainers.

entry.title: What Is Ronin? The Ethereum Gaming Chain Behind 'Axie Infinity' and 'Pixels'
entry.summary: Ronin is an Ethereum sidechain that powers some of the best-known crypto games. Here's what you need to know about the network, RON token, and games.

entry.title: Bitcoin Regains $72K After Rocky Start to the Month
entry.summary: With the Bitcoin halving on the horizon, market volatility is leading to liquidations.

entry.title: Detained Execs, Daring Escapes: How Binance's $35 Million Battle With Nigeria Unfolded
entry.summary: With one Binance executive detained in Nigeria and another having fled custody, the exchange faces a legal storm in the country.

entry.title: If the Bitcoin Halving Is Super Bullish, Why Does BTC Crash Shortly After?
entry.summary: If the halving is so bullish for Bitcoin, why does historical data show BTC crashes within a year following each halving event?

entry.title: This Week in Crypto Games: Notcoin Token at Bitcoin Halving, Saga Breaks Binance Record, and BTC 'Game Boy'
entry.summary: Another busy week for crypto gaming as Notcoin dates its token launch, Saga's own launch nears, and a Bitcoin gaming handheld is revealed.

entry.title: Wormhole Wednesday
entry.summary: BTC hits $64.5K then rebounds, SOL outperforms. Government sends $2B BTC to Coinbase to sell. Funding rates stay low after sweep lower. ETFs see small inflow, Ark outflow more than GBTC. Wormhole W launches at $15B FDV. BTC ‘inflection point’ if it follows rates or gold. Gold & BTC very correlated for the last year. Expect slower ETF volume this month: Bloomberg. BTC 2x and 3x levered ETFs launch yesterday. BTC ETFs now half the size of gold.

entry.title: Elon Musk's Grok AI Chatbot Has Weakest Security, While Meta's Llama Stands Strong: Researchers
entry.summary: No chatbot should help people build a bomb, but jailbreaking techniques can trick them into going too far.

entry.title: This Week In Crypto Twitter: Meme Coins and Base are Booming While Solana Strains
entry.summary: Where there were dog coins, POOP perhaps inevitably followed. Also, Ethena emerges with a Bitcoin backing.

entry.title: Avenged Sevenfold's Season Pass is Turning Heavy Metal Fans Into Blockchain 'Evangelists'
entry.summary: Frontman Matt Sanders (aka M. Shadows) explains how the Fortnite-style platform offers fans rewards for engaging with Avenged Sevenfold.

entry.title: Federal Watchdog Takes Aim at Crypto Gaming
entry.summary: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau says game asset trading volumes exceed the gross domestic product of small countries and can lead to “exploited workers.”

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin Ends on a Downer as Rival Bitcoin Cash Shines
entry.summary: As Bitcoin dropped in price, so did everything else. Fork and rival Bitcoin Cash did well, though.

entry.title: Binance Users Stake Record $13 Billion to Earn Saga Gaming Token Rewards
entry.summary: Saga’s token is launching next week, and Binance customers are showing record-breaking interest in its rewards campaign.

entry.title: ‘Nyan Heroes’ Tops 100K Players on Epic Games, Reveals Solana NFT Rewards
entry.summary: With just days remaining in the pre-alpha demo test, Nyan Heroes is tempting players with Solana NFT rewards to climb the leaderboards.

entry.title: This Little Device Can Hold Your Bitcoin, Play Games—And Farm Airdrops as You Sleep
entry.summary: The Game Boy-like BitBoy One is a Bitcoin-themed gaming handheld, BTC wallet, and DePIN airdrop farmer all in one portable device.

entry.title: ‘Notcoin’ Telegram Game Will Return After Token Launch—With Big Changes
entry.summary: Viral Telegram-based game Notcoin is plotting a revival after the April 20 airdrop. Here’s what the team told us about the new approach.

entry.title: Terra Founder Do Kwon Found Liable for Fraud in SEC Lawsuit
entry.summary: The federal regulator prevails in asserting that the stablecoin issuer and its founder misled investors.

entry.title: Tensor NFT Marketplace Reveals Solana Token Launch, Coinbase to List
entry.summary: The TNSR token is coming to Coinbase, joining previously listed Solana tokens like BONK, FIDA, and ORCA.

entry.title: China Is Escalating AI Use in Efforts to Influence US Elections, Microsoft Warns
entry.summary: The tech giant sounds the alarm about China's use of AI-generated content and “sockpuppets” on social media.

entry.title: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF Gets Backing From Wall Street Titan Goldman Sachs
entry.summary: The success of Bitcoin ETFs is even forcing crypto skeptics to clamor for “a piece of the action,” experts say.

entry.title: Solana Price Falls Amid Network Congestion as Wormhole Plunges After Airdrop
entry.summary: Solana is the biggest loser in the top 10 coins amid network issues, but tokens running on the network are falling harder.

entry.title: Dogwifhat Down Double-Digits as Meme Coins Retrace Last Week's Gains
entry.summary: Solana-based meme coin WIF continued to retrace from last week's all-time high, as the broader meme coin category posted losses.

entry.title: Dogecoin Now Has Its Own Version of Buzzy Bitcoin Ordinals Project Runestone
entry.summary: An airdrop of 30,272 Dogecoin NFTs this week mirrored Runestone's own “free and fair” distribution in March.

entry.title: PayPal Enables Stablecoin-To-Fiat Option for International Money Payments
entry.summary: Users can now swap PYUSD for dollars to make international payments via Xoom.

entry.title: How Long Until Grayscale’s ETF Runs Out of Bitcoin?
entry.summary: Why has the fund shifted so much BTC? And is it a problem?

entry.title: Saga Gaming Token Launch Set as Binance Users Stake $3.9 Billion for Rewards
entry.summary: The SAGA token listing is just days away as Binance reveals a Launchpool rewards campaign with half the initial supply.

entry.title: Biden and Trump Meme Coins Skyrocket on Solana: Which One's Winning This Race?
entry.summary: Goofy meme coins “Jeo Boden” and “Doland Tremp” are posting massive gains Thursday—but one is the clear winner.

entry.title: Bitcoin Mining Ban Proposed in Paraguay Over Power Problems
entry.summary: A proposed law would ban more than Bitcoin mining in Paraguay, with critics saying it could also outlaw crypto staking and even wallets.

entry.title: Ethereum Can Still Avoid Being Labeled a Security, Says JP Morgan
entry.summary: The network is becoming more decentralized as the share of Lido in staked ETH decreases, financial analysts argue.

entry.title: Bitcoin Price Returns to $69,000 Ahead of 4/20 Halving
entry.summary: The price of Bitcoin is on the way back up after a rough start to the month—with less than two weeks until the anticipated halving.

entry.title: First Dogs, Now Cats
entry.summary: BTC falls another 6% amid $400m liquidations. ETF outflows and dollar strength blamed for move. Funding completely reset to lows in move. BTC lower high leaves market in ‘no trade zone’. This cycle acting ‘nothing like previous cycle’. ETH unlikely to be classed a security: Coinbase CFO. Crypto VC funding up 53% in MarchAnsem’s cat coin sees more volume than NFT market. Most memecoins down 10-20% given move in majors. MEW up 10% after HTX lists, airdrop to Saga phones. MEME to launch memecoin chain, NFTs rise. Pixelmon releases trailer for Anime series.

entry.title: We Do A Little With Spencer Gordon-Sand
entry.summary:
In this week’s episode, we sit down with Spencer Gordon Sand, the mastermind behind Spencer Ventures. Before launching Spencer Ventures, Spencer was a competitive fencer, Magic the gathering player, and startup enjoyooor.
We dive into Spencer’s investment thesis behind NFTs and how his fund invests, finding and buying distressed assets in a bear market , point farming optimization, a peak behind the 3AC liquidation and dickbutt buys, and so much more.

entry.title: How To Get Your Foot In Ihe Door And Building During Bear Markets
entry.summary:
In this week’s episode, we sit down with Intern and Tunez from the Monad team. Prior to Monad, Tunez was working with Delphi Digital and Intern was working at CMS Holdings. They’re two of my oldest friends from crypto twitter.
We get into why they joined the Monad team, alpha for finding jobs in the space, biggest lessons from previous cycles, and so much more.

entry.title: SBF Sentencing
entry.summary: BTC: 70.7k (+1%), ETH: 3585 (0%), SOL: 186 (-1%). Top 100 gainers: DOGE, GT, BCH, RBN. Crypto mixed, BTC-beta & memes outperform. SEC case vs Coinbase set to go to trial. DeFi win as case dismissed vs Coinbase wallet. ETFs see $244m inflows led by Ark. BlackRock ETF fastest growing in history: Fink. ETH ETF possible even if its a security: Fink. ETH spot ETF by May chances only 20%: GSR. SBF sentencing today, faces 50 years.

entry.title: The $63 Million Exploit
entry.summary: BTC consolidates around $70k, funding still low. ETFs see $418m inflow as GBTC outflow tiny. BTC set to have record 7th-straight green month. AI coins soar, FET hits ATH amid merger rumour. FET, OCEAN, AGIX token proposed at $7.5bn FDV. DoJ charges KuCoin over money laundering. KuCoin sees $800m outflows after charges. CFTC names ETH & LTC commodities in charges. HK set to allow ‘in-kind’ style ETFs. HSBC launches tokenised gold fund. Fidelity files S1 form for ETH ETF. Short sellers bet $11bn crypto rally won’t last. More customer USDC balances to be stored on Base.

entry.title: BTC Is Back On Top
entry.summary: BTC breaks $70K as $175M of shorts liquidated. ETFs see net inflow despite high GBTC outflows. Gold miner set to buy $1.7B BTC. UK to list crypto ETNs in May. ETH ETF may still be approved: Grayscale. Grayscale ETH discount falls to 22%. ETH ETF has no positive signs: Bloomberg. Coinbase pumps 10%, Ark continue to sell shares. Coinbase Int. record trading volumes in March. FTX to sell majority of Anthropic stake for $884M. Trader makes $20m profit in MEW rally. Puppets hit ATH, lead move higher in Ordinals. Azuki flips MAYC market cap in bounce. Magic Eden makes $15m in 30d trading revenue.

entry.title: Base On Top
entry.summary: Majors continue to rally as ETF sentiment improves. Genesis have likely sold half their GBTC position. BlackRock could flip GBTC holdings in 3 weeks. BTC short squeeze would liquidate $6.6bn by $75k. Lack of on-chain activity indicates ‘limited selling’. BTC crucial to the financial system: BlackRock. Resurging interest in crypto assets: Goldman Sachs. Crypto summer has started: Raoul Pal. Base outpaces SOL & ETH for trading volumes.

entry.title: ETF Outflows Continue
entry.summary: Despite Bitcoin's decline, several alternative cryptocurrencies remain robust. Fantom (FTM) emerges as the top-performing Layer 1 blockchain, while Coinbase introduces futures trading. Exchange-traded funds (ETFs) witness a $94 million outflow, although outflows from Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) may decelerate. Approximately $1 billion worth of Bitcoin shorts face liquidation if prices reach $67.8k. Coinbase's premium resurfaces, marking the first occurrence since Bitcoin's all-time high. Bitcoin continues its streak with seven consecutive months of positive performance. Solana's (SOL) decentralized exchange (DEX) achieves a monthly volume of $50 billion, with revenue soaring 30-fold. OKX announces support for a new Solana token standard. Despite expectations, Layer 2 activity remains sluggish post-Dencun, according to Vitalik Buterin.

entry.title: We Do A Little With Postwook
entry.summary:
In this week’s episode, we sit down with Natasha Chomko aka Postwook. Postwook is a Los Angeles based digital artist focused on cooking up some of the most visually pleasing and nostalgia provoking surreal landscape collage art.
We dive into Postwook’s origin story, training like an athlete as an artist, diversifying income streams, beating addiction, dealing with the ebbs and flows of being a full time artist in a volatile space, and so much more.

entry.title: Scaling Ethereum and Aligning Incentives with the Chief Strategic Officer of Offchain Labs
entry.summary:
In this episode, we are joined by AJ Warner, the Chief Strategic Officer of Offchain Labs, the main contributors to the Arbitrum ecosystem. AJ is a gigabrain chad who joined the Offchain Labs in November 2020 and has been their CSO since January 2022.
We dive into AJ’s crypto origin story, how he joined Offchain Labs, the technical and ideological differences between Arbitrum and other scaling solutions, how the scaling solution business model works, the biggest blockers in crypto as investors and builders, and so much more.

entry.title: Founding The Nifty & BoDoggos, learnings from multiple years of hosting daily shows, and leveling up the crypto content industry
entry.summary:
Starting Season 4 of We Do A Little with a great interview featuring Nick and Pio from The Nifty and BoDoggos.
Alongside developing their business and identity, they have consistently delivered entertaining morning shows and humorous content centered around the crypto.
In this episode, we delve into Nick and Pio’s backgrounds prior to collaborating, explore the story of their meeting, discuss their individual sources of inspiration, examine their strategic approach to expanding the Nifty team, and much more.

entry.title: Vitalik Buterin Discusses Ethereum's Dencun Upgrade and More at ETH Taipei 2024
entry.summary: Ethereum creator Vitalik Buterin answers questions from Rug Radio and other media outlets at ETH Taipei 2024. He discusses the recent Dencun network upgrade and a variety of other topics. (Credit: Rug Radio/Decrypt)

entry.title: The Weekend Madness
entry.summary: Bitcoin rebounds as users withdraw funds from exchanges. Solana breaks $200, surpassing Binance Coin to claim the 4th spot in crypto rankings. Ethereum's supply drops to a two-year low. Over $100 million raised by new coin presales in just two days. A dog NFT sells for a staggering $4.3 million. PRIME emerges as the leader in gaming coins, while NodeMonkes flips Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC).

entry.title: BOME Blast off
entry.summary: BTC experiences a 9% drop, resulting in $700 million liquidations, with funding and open interest hitting their lowest levels in weeks. The sell-off appears more sustained compared to previous brief dips, with most BTC downside liquidations concentrated around $66,000. ETFs witness $132 million inflows, sparking predictions of a potential liquidity crisis within six months. VanEck suggests that an ETH ETF could surpass BTC in size. Grayscale's ETH discount doubles within a week. Meanwhile, SOL's market cap reaches an all-time high amid a frenzy surrounding memecoins. Additionally, rumors circulate about a fund losing $1 billion on the BTC-MicroStrategy basis.

entry.title: This is The Time of SOL
entry.summary: ETFs match last week’s inflows in just 3 days. ETH Dencun upgrade goes, ETH coins broadly fall. ETH L2 costs for trading decrease dramatically. SOL nears $100bn FDV as activity soars. SOL DEX volume now 3x ETH mainnet. MicroStrategy plans $500m raise to buy more BTC. Franklin Templeton releases memecoin paper. AEVO faces FUD about tokenomics.

entry.title: Bitcoin Hits ATH Again
entry.summary: Bitcoin hits a new high at $73.1k with a 2% increase, while Ethereum remains steady at $4050 and Solana sees a similar surge to $154. TON, RBN, RUNE, and QNT emerge as top gainers, capturing market attention. BTC's unprecedented rise is fueled by a record $1 billion in ETF inflows, coinciding with Ethereum's Dencun upgrade promising significant changes for Layer 2 solutions.

entry.title: CPI COMES IN, BTC HOLDS 72
entry.summary: Bitcoin (BTC) at $72k and Ethereum (ETH) at $4035, both up 1%. Solana (SOL) rises 3% to $152. Leading gains: TON, XRP, IOTA, FLOW. Bitcoin nears record high with significant ETF investments. Solana sees spike in new users. TON surges 30% with Telegram IPO rumors. Ark Invest offloads $69m in Coinbase stock. Predictions: Bitcoin could outdo gold, potentially reaching $150k. Blast platform's value hits $3bn with higher yields. Biden proposes crypto miner tax. El Salvador profits $84m from Bitcoin. Monad plans $200m raise led by Paradigm.

entry.title: BITCOIN HITS $72,000!
entry.summary: BTC hits new ATH of $72k, flips Silver market cap. Wick lower then higher causes $350m liquidations. London Stock Exchange to consider crypto ETNs. Funding again soars before ETF buying begins. Crypto saw record $2.7bn inflows last week. MicroStrategy buys another $821m of BTC.

entry.title: BTC HITS 70K!
entry.summary: ETF net inflows hit $472m in strong week. GBTC outflows hit $10bn, nearly overtaken by new 9. BlackRock to allow more funds to buy BTC ETFs. Rumours still of Qatar buying amid Bukele meeting.
